author: Nicole Blackmore
title: Budget 2015: How inheritance tax changes might affect you
text: Budget 2015: How inheritance tax changes might affect you This week's summer Budget is likely to bring huge inheritance tax savings for people with expensive properties Married couples will be able to pass on assets worth up to Â£1m, including a family home, without paying any IHT at all. Photo: ALAMY
